name: get-this
description: Get the active editor's file path as an environment variable 'THIS' for use in the terminal

getthis.shellConfigAccess.description: Allow the Get This! extension to store the 'THIS' environment variable in the user's shell configs. UNIX/Linux only - has no effect on Windows.

getthis.showActiveEditorWarning.description: Show a warning when switching to a tab that isn't an editor, e.g. the Settings tab.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
